usage.cn: 美貌固然肤浅，丑陋却能深入骨髓
usage.eng: Beauty is superficial, but ugly goes down to the bone.

usage.cn: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美好的人
usage.eng: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

usage.cn: ——爱你的人，会爱上你的缺点；不爱你的人，无法理解你的美。
usage.eng: The one who loves you will love your imperfections. The one who does not love you could not understand your beauty.

usage.cn: 你不仅读的是某个人的生活经历, 而且这会让你反省你自己的生活, 这就是书的魅力，这也是我为什么如此爱书。 出自：欧泊尔 美国脱口秀王牌主持人
usage.eng: You are read somebody else's life, but it makes you think of your own. that the beauty of it. that's why I love books.
